Detailed Description

Equidistant binned 1D histogram without data container.

The histogram is kept very simple and does not make use of virtual functions in order to be very fast. Note: the histogram does not have a data container. A usable histogram is the FloatHistogram1D.

Definition at line 27 of file Histogram1D.hh.

Member Function Documentation

void histmgr::Histogram1D::addToEntries ( Double_t  weight  )  [inline, protected]

Add weight to the number of entries.

Weight is usually 1, but may be a fractional value in the interval (0,oo). NOTE: No range check of the weight is performed.
